element_text:
{"chunk": "underskud indgår i opgørelsen af den udskudte skat,
såfremt det er sandsynligt, at underskuddene kan
udnyttes.
The tax-based values of tax losses carried forward are
included in the statement of deferred tax if it is probable
that the losses can be utilised.
Udskudte skatteaktiver som ikke forventes udnyttet inden", "context": "The chunk is discussing the accounting treatment of deferred tax assets related to tax losses carried forward, stating that they are recognized in the statement of deferred tax if it is probable that the losses can be utilized, and that deferred tax assets not expected to be utilized within a shorter period are disclosed as contingent assets."}
